sentences.en: Both sides had reciprocally observed restraints.
sentences.cn: 双方都遵守了限制性规定。

sentences.en: Computer simulation shows that the proportional gain is dependent on the round - trip time reciprocally.
sentences.cn: 计算机仿真给出了比例增益与往返程时滞之间的反比关系.

sentences.en: Convex and concave for gripping must be distributed reciprocally in this range.
sentences.cn: 在此范围内,用于夹持的凹凸处必须一一对应分布.

sentences.en: The goals of the negotiators were not reciprocally exclusive.
sentences.cn: 谈判各方的目的并非相互排斥.

sentences.en: To act reciprocally or in return.
sentences.cn: 行为、情感或物质上作为回报.

sentences.en: Volcanic rock from two eruptive sources, Taoyuan - Hongxing and southern Dapingfang weaves and superimposes reciprocally in strata.
sentences.cn: 桃园 - 红星方向和大平房以南两个喷发源所喷发出的火山岩相互交织叠置于地层之间.

sentences.en: Wavelength and frequency are, of course, related reciprocally.
sentences.cn: 波长和频率当然是相反的关系.

sentences.en: While sucrose increased, hexoses and specific amino acids decreased reciprocally.
sentences.cn: 当蔗糖含量增加时, 相反的,己糖和部分氨基酸含量下降.

words.tran_cn: 互惠的；相互的；倒数的，彼此相反的
[数] 倒数；互相起作用的事物
